This is the personal website for the human–computer interaction researcher Zachary Levonian.

Site structure:
- The index page (`/`) lists his peer-reviewed papers.
- The blog page (`/blog`) lists his 100+ blog posts.

The index page includes links to Zachary's other online accounts.

This is a Jekyll site hosted on GitHub Pages. 
If you want the markdown for any post in the blog or to access any of the accompanying code for the blog posts, you can find it here: https://github.com/levon003/levon003.github.io

Zachary is a human–computer interaction researcher and data scientist who has done research in social media, health, and education.
He has primarily worked at non-profit tech companies as a machine learning engineer after completing his Computer Science PhD in 2022.
